query:
ALTER TABLE budgets 
CHANGE COLUMN budgetNumber budget_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
CHANGE COLUMN clientId client_id INT NOT NULL,
CHANGE COLUMN validUntil valid_until VARCHAR(10),
CHANGE COLUMN templateId template_id INT,
CHANGE COLUMN createdBy created_by INT NOT NULL,
CHANGE COLUMN createdAt created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
CHANGE COLUMN updatedAt updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL;
